Module contents¶

plexsim.get_include()¶

Return the directory that contains the plexim *.h header files. Extension modules that need to compile against plexsim should use this function to locate the appropriate include directory. .. rubric:: Notes

When using distutils, for example in setup.py.

import plexsim
...
Extension('extension_name', ...
        include_dirs=[plexsim.get_include()])
...
